All Social Gadgets are in _opensocial.war_.

h1. Activity Stream {anchor:id=SOCref.List_Of_Gadget_in_Social.ActivityStream}
* *Description*: Manages activities of users: update status, like/unlike activities, comment activities, delete activities and delete comments. 
* *Used REST services*: ActivitiesRestServices.

h1. Social RSS Reader {anchor:id=SOCref.List_Of_Gadget_in_Social.SocialRSSReader}

* *Description*: Fetches, parses and display RSS from a specific URL. 
* *Description of user preferences*: There are 2 pref fields: URL input box (default value is http://blog.exoplatform.org/feed/) and Number of RSS per page selector (default value is 10).
* *Used REST services*: N/A.


h1. My Connections {anchor:id=SOCref.List_Of_Gadget_in_Social.MyConnections}

* *Description*: Gets and display information of the current viewer and his connections.
* *Description of user preferences*: Connections displayed per page. The number of connections displayed is set to '5' by default.
* *Used REST services*: N/A.


h1. My Spaces {anchor:id=SOCref.List_Of_Gadget_in_Social.MySpaces}
* *Description*: Displays all spaces that a user has the "member" role.
* *Used REST services*: SpacesRestService.
